short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to display keystrokes, highly customisable, perfect for improving browser accessibility!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing KeysOnScreen, your essential Chrome extension for an enhanced browsing experience! With KeysOnScreen, you can visualize your keyboard actions on the screen in real-time, making it perfect for:

- Accessibility: Improve web accessibility for users with visual impairments or those who benefit from visual keyboard feedback.
- Education: Enhance learning and tutorials by displaying key presses during presentations and online courses.
- Presentations: Engage your audience by showcasing your keyboard actions, ensuring clarity and understanding.
-Customization: Tailor your experience with light and dark themes, opacity control, and more.

Experience a user-friendly, customizable tool that revolutionizes Chrome's accessibility features. KeysOnScreen delivers a seamless and inclusive browsing experience for all. Try it today!"
